member.name: M:Brevitee.Data.Repositories.PocoDaoGenerator.GetOneToManyTypesFor(System.Type)
member.summary: Get the types for each IEnumerable property of the specified type

member.name: T:Brevitee.Data.Repositories.TypeXref
member.summary: Used to describe a many to many relationship between two types. This would imply that each type has an IEnumerable property of the other type
